about.title: About Casa Petanque
about.subtitle: A Story of Passion and Hospitality
about.paragraph1: Casa Petanque was born from a love of the traditional French game and the desire to create a unique vacation experience. Our property combines the authentic charm of Mediterranean living with modern comforts.
about.paragraph2: Located in a picturesque setting, our home offers the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life. Whether you're an avid petanque player or simply looking for a peaceful retreat, Casa Petanque provides an unforgettable experience.
about.paragraph3: We take pride in maintaining our professional-grade petanque court and ensuring every detail of your stay is perfect. From the fully equipped kitchen to the comfortable bedrooms, every aspect has been carefully considered.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your stay

q1.question: What is petanque?
q1.answer: Petanque is a traditional French game similar to boules or bocce. Players throw metal balls as close as possible to a small wooden ball called a cochonnet. Our professional court is perfect for both beginners and experienced players.

q2.question: How many people can stay at Casa Petanque?
q2.answer: Casa Petanque comfortably accommodates up to 8 guests with 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms. We also have additional space for children upon request.

q3.question: What amenities are included?
q3.answer: The house includes a fully equipped kitchen, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, heating, washing machine, outdoor BBQ area, swimming pool, and of course, our professional petanque court. All linens and towels are provided.

q4.question: Is the property suitable for children?
q4.answer: Yes! Casa Petanque is family-friendly. We have a secure pool area, outdoor games, and plenty of space for children to play safely. High chairs and cribs are available upon request.

q5.question: What is the check-in/check-out time?
q5.answer: Check-in is from 3:00 PM and check-out is by 11:00 AM. We can accommodate early check-in or late check-out when available - please contact us to arrange.

q6.question: Are pets allowed?
q6.answer: We welcome well-behaved pets! Please let us know in advance if you plan to bring your furry friend. A small additional cleaning fee may apply.
